data.title: Long Keeps Radio Property In The Family
data.meta_description: In a deal brokered by Kalil & Co., Long Communications LLC on April 24 closed on its sale of a UHF television station in the Charlotte DMA. At the time, the Long family confirmed its radio property would see no changes. That's not entirely true.
data.text:
In a deal brokered by Kalil & Co., Long Communications LLC on April 24 closed on its sale of a UHF television station within the Charlotte DMA to Family Worship Center Church, the Louisiana-based Ministry headed by the famed Rev. Jimmy Swaggart.

At the time, the Long family confirmed its AM radio station and companion FM translator would see no changes. Thatâ€™s not entirely true: the station is being sold, but to family members.
